title: Hour 3 - John Smoltz (07-27-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - John Smoltz (07-27-20)
description:
With the departure of safety Jamal Adams, where do the Jets stand now? Also, Dan issues his own stern decision on what to do with the Clippers' Lou Williams after Williams exited the NBA bubble to attend, among other things, a strip club for takeout dinner. Plus, Dan shares his own strip club mealtime story. And finally, reaction to Astros' pitcher Justin Verlander's injury, rising Covid-19 cases within MLB clubhouses, and Hall of Famer and FOX Sports MLB analyst John Smoltz.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
